description: Heat the water to the desired temperature for brewing tea.
name: Heat the water
pseudocode: Pour water into a kettle or pot. Place the kettle or pot on the heat source. Turn on the heat source. Wait for the water to reach the desired temperature.

description: Steep the tea bag in the heated water.
name: Steep the tea bag
pseudocode: Place the tea bag in a cup or mug. Pour the heated water over the tea bag. Allow the tea bag to steep for the recommended time.
